fr.ensimag.deca.syntax

Class AbstractDecaLexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Lexer
      • fr.ensimag.deca.syntax.AbstractDecaLexer

  • public abstract class AbstractDecaLexer
extends Lexer
    This is the super class for the lexer. It is extended by the lexer class generated from DecaLexer.g.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractDecaLexer(CharStream input)
      Default constructor for the lexer.

      • setSource

        public void setSource(java.io.File source)

      • getDecacCompiler

      • setDecacCompiler

        public void setDecacCompiler(DecacCompiler decacCompiler)

      • getSourceName

        public java.lang.String getSourceName(RecognitionException e)
        If e is linked to an input stream, return the source name for this stream. Otherwise (e.g. user-defined RecognitionException that do not set the input field), return the source name for this Lexer.

      • debugTokenStream

        public boolean debugTokenStream()
        Display the list of tokens for the lexer in semi-human-readable form. This consumes the stream of tokens, hence should never be called if the parser has to read these tokens afterwards.
        Returns:
        true if the lexer raised an error.

      • createLexerFromArgs

        public static DecaLexer createLexerFromArgs(java.lang.String[] args)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Helper for test drivers, that creates a lexer from command-line arguments.
        Parameters:
        args - Either empty (read from stdin), or 1-element array (the file to read from)
        Returns:
        The lexer built from args
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getSource

        protected java.io.File getSource()

      • nextToken

        public Token nextToken()
        Override method nextToken for #include management.
        Returns:
        the next Token which is read in an included files on a #include
